org.openimaj.audio.util

Class AudioUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.audio.util.AudioUtils

  • public class AudioUtils
extends Object
    Various static methods for dealing with audio information and data.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • getDevices

        public static List<AudioDevice> getDevices()
        Returns a list of devices that are available on this system.
        Returns:

      • getJavaOutputLine

        public static SourceDataLine getJavaOutputLine(String deviceName,
                               AudioFormat af)
                                        throws LineUnavailableException
        Returns a Java sound line for the given device name. Use AudioDevice.deviceName as input to this method. Use getDevices() to get an AudioDevice object.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - The device name.
        af - The format
        Returns:
        A Java sound line.
        Throws:
        LineUnavailableException

      • getAnyJavaOutputLine

        public static SourceDataLine getAnyJavaOutputLine(AudioFormat af)
                                           throws LineUnavailableException
        Gets a Java output line (SourceDataLine) that can play something with the given audio format.
        Parameters:
        af - The audio format.
        Returns:
        A SourceDataLine
        Throws:
        LineUnavailableException

      • frequencyToMelFrequency

        public static double frequencyToMelFrequency(double freq)
        Converts a frequency to an approximation of a Mel frequency. This formula gives a close approximation for frequencies less than 1000Hz.
        Parameters:
        freq - The frequency to convert
        Returns:
        The Mel frequency

      • melFrequencyToFrequency

        public static double melFrequencyToFrequency(double melFreq)
        Converts a Mel frequency back into an approximation of a frequency.
        Parameters:
        melFreq - The Mel frequency to convert
        Returns:
        The frequency
